Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Subject: Hadith (Shiites) $v Texts $v Early works to 1800|~|ʿAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, $c Caliph, $d 600 (ca.)-661 $x Hadith
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Name.author: ʿAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, $c Caliph, $d 600 (ca.)-661
Title: Nathr al-laʾālī
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 3, 12
Description.abstract: An alphabetical compilation of the sayings of ʿAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, the first Shīʿī Imām, assembled by al-Ṭabarsī. Includes an incomplete Persian translation underneath the Arabic verses. Written in exquisite Arabic and Persian calligraphy.
Description.citation: Āghā Buzurg al-Ṭihrānī, Dharīʿah ilā taṣānif al-Shīʿah (Al-Najaf: Maṭbaʿat al-Gharrā, 1936-1986), v. 4 (262), p. 53-4.|~|Muḥammad Taqī Dānish-pazhūh, Fihrist-i Nushahhā-yi khaṭṭī, daftar 11 & 12 (Ṭihrān: Intishārāt-i Dānishgāh-i Ṭihrān, 1039 AH), p. 375.
Description.note: Needs review. Lisa McAulay changed the status from Needs Review in order to release to the items to regular digital 2. And all children
